name: Ungra Walker
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

UNGRA WALKER is an exploration action game. The dungeons are renewed under the"Automatic Dungeon Generation System" as you play your way through. In a fantasy world of the Medieval ages, fight against monsters that get in your way and collect numerous items in the dungeons.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
